title: Esther 1-4  For Such a Time as This (13:51)
short_title: Esther 1-4  For Such a Time as This (13:51)
content: Esther 1-4  For Such a Time as This (13:51)

Not knowing that his new wife Esther was a Jew, King Ahasuerus of Persia approved a decree that all persons of Jewish descent should be killed. Showing great faith, Esther entered the king's court without an invitation to plead for her people.
